thread.title: beautiful skyline views and excellent service
thread.title_full: beautiful skyline views and excellent service - Review of Dumont NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Brenda C
title: beautiful skyline views and excellent service
text: The Dumont is the hotel I go to when in Manhattan. it is in a central location with easy access in and out. The rooms are spacious, and prompt attention is given when you call for additional needs. It is the hotel I stay in on each of my frequent trips to New York - midtown.
